name: Project Sweat (Canceled)
blurb: A stunning 2D Action RPG aiming to blend an addictive, challenging & fast pace combat system in a seamless multi-layered environment.

rewards.reward: No Reward
We can't thank you enough, your support shows that you believe in our abilities and see potential in our project - you won't be disappointed.
You get a digital Download of the complete game at an extra low price for your early support. As the First 500 in line for a pre-order, We really can't thank you enough.
You'll get a digital download of the complete game on release at this discounted price. We give to you our huge thanks.
*Digital Rewards 1,\r\nYou will receive a digital downloadable copy of the game when it's complete along with the digital manual and Hi-Res Wallpapers
*Digital Rewards 2,\r\nYou will receive a digital downloadable copy of the game when it's complete along with the digital manual and the Digital Artbook PDF
*Digital Rewards 3,\r\nYou will receive a digital downloadable copy of the game when it's complete along with the digital manual, Hi-Res Wallpapers & the Digital Artbook PDF
